metadata.synopsis: One liner for if you initiate dialog with Banite Guard07 on the top floor of the Felogyr's Fireworks building. Always starts a combat.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go invisible or otherwise sneak up on a guard and iniaitiate dialog

0.speaker: Fist of Bane Volgu Drak
0.text: I like trespassers - I like the sounds they make when I break their bones.
